item.title: Transport v1.7.0.5
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.7.0.5
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 05 Dec 2023 20:03:44 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.7.0]
- Issue #72: display intermittent values in Lockin_Sweep
- Issue #75: R and G calculations are more flexible
- Update Lockin_time and Lockin_sweep to handle vector magnet instruments
- Update Lockin_sweep to more frequently poll instruments for their status
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.0.1.4
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.0.1.4
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 05 Dec 2023 17:04:37 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.0.1]
- Fix close lockin in generate comments
- update palette category
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Remote Control.ZMQ v1.1.0.2
item.description:
Product: Remote Control.ZMQ v1.1.0.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 05 Dec 2023 15:52:56 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Override library implementing ZMQ lazy pirate reliable request reply (RRR) protocal using RemoteControl SMO framework.

Release Notes: [1.1.0]
- Updated to work with JSON-RPC v1.1
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: JSON-RPC v1.1.0.3
item.description:
Product: JSON-RPC v1.1.0.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 05 Dec 2023 14:28:55 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Library for encoding and decoding JSON-RPC 2.0 request and response objects

https://www.jsonrpc.org/specification

Release Notes: [1.1.0]
- change API methods connectors to make method and params/response consistently on 2nd and 3rd rows, respectively
- update JSON-RPC encoding code
- add method for converting JSON to LVtype
- add methods for flattening/unflattening to string to JSON (faster than converting directly with JSONtext)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.0.0.3
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.0.0.3
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 01 Dec 2023 10:53:02 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.0.0.3]
- Fix install location
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: JSON-RPC v1.0.1.2
item.description:
Product: JSON-RPC v1.0.1.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 01 Dec 2023 09:44:49 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Library for encoding and decoding JSON-RPC 2.0 request and response objects

https://www.jsonrpc.org/specification

Release Notes: [1.0.1]
- change methods for creating request and response objects (use Make JSON Object instead of Set Item)
- change to response encoding: use same method as request object. Single elements (float, string, etc) will be converted to an array. This is done so that parsing of params and results can be done in the same way.
- updated palettes
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
